content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property the applicant was awarded a garage and a volkswagen caravelle car while the defendant was awarded a volvo v60 car the court also awarded the defendant a ½ share of the apartment the legal text discusses various articles of the civil code related to matrimonial property the applicant requested the dissolution of their marriage and custody of their children the court dissolved the marriage divided the property and established a usufruct for the defendant to reside in the disputed apartment with the children the court also ordered the applicant to pay certain costs the court dismissed the amended application and upheld the counterclaim in part the defendant was awarded the garage and car and the applicant was awarded a sum of 685 euros for a ½ share of the apartment

metadata.cost: 685.00 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the defendant
